metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8621 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
t-coffee before 11.00.8cbe486-2 allows local users to write to ~/.t_coffeeglobally.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8621` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

t-coffee - 11.00.8cbe486-2
t-coffee-examples - 11.00.8cbe486-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: t-coffee package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '11.00.8cbe486-2').
